credit_line: Gift of Jean Smith Fowle and Curtis Fowle, Class of 1935
title: Portrait of Rembrandt Peale (Copy after Self-Portrait by Rembrandt Peale, 1850)
inscriptions: verso (now concealed by lining): Copied by Mary J. Peale at Riverdale, Aug. 1872, from the best likeness of Rembrandt Peale painted by himself; given to his wife and, at her death, she left it to the Academy of fine Arts, Phila. Loaned to me to copy. M.J. Peale
